definition: To separate or tear apart forcefully, often referring to the action of ripping or tearing something into pieces. It is commonly used to describe the physical act of tearing objects like paper, fabric, or other materials.

examples.german: Die Schülerin zerreißen das Blatt Papier.
examples.english: The student tears the sheet of paper.

examples.german: Er zerreißen den Brief in kleine Stücke.
examples.english: He tears the letter into small pieces.
